item.text: Then a measuring rod like a staff was given to me, and I was told, “Get up and measure the temple of God, and the altar, and the ones who worship there.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3354" class="">measure</st> the <st data-num="1855" class="">outer</st> <st data-num="833" class="">courtyard</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="3485">temple</st>; <st data-num="1544" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1855" class="">out</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> has been <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="3961" class="">trample</st> on the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="5" /> for <st data-num="5062">forty</st>-<st data-num="1417">two</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3144" class="">witnesses</st> authority<n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st> for <st data-num="5507 1250 1835">1,260</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="4016" class="">dressed</st> in <st data-num="4526">sackcloth</st>.”

(<st data-num="3778">These</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="1636">olive trees</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3087" class="">lampstands</st> that <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> of the <st data-num="1093">earth</st>.)<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="91" class="">harm</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="1607">comes out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">completely consumes</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st>. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="91" class="">harm</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, they <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="3779">this way</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> two <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="2808">close up</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> it does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5205" class="">rain</st> during the <st data-num="2250" class="">time</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="4394" class="">prophesying</st>. They<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="4762" class="">turn</st> the <st data-num="5204" class="">waters</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3960" class="">strike</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3959" class="">every kind</st> of <st data-num="4127" class="">plague</st> <st data-num="3740 1437">whenever</st> they <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st>.

<st data-num="3752" class="">When</st><n id="1" /> they have <st data-num="5055" class="">completed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st>, the <st data-num="2342" class="">beast</st> that <st data-num="305">comes up</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="12" class="">abyss</st> will <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">war</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3528" class="">conquer</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">Their</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4430" class="">corpses</st> will lie <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4116">street</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="4153" class="">symbolically</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> <st data-num="4670" class="">Sodom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> was <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>.

For <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2255" class="">half</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> those <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> every<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="5443" class="">tribe</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1484" class="">nation</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">language</st> will <st data-num="991">look at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4430" class="">corpses</st> because they will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">permit</st> them to be <st data-num="5087" class="">placed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3418" class="">tomb</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> will <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2165" class="">celebrate</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3992" class="">sending</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gifts</st> to <st data-num="240" class="">each other</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> had <st data-num="928" class="">tormented</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> a <st data-num="2255" class="">half</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> a <st data-num="4151" class="">breath</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">tremendous</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="1968" class="">seized</st><n id="2" /> those who were <st data-num="2334" class="">watching</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> they<n id="2" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them:</st> “<st data-num="305" class="">Come up</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>!” <st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> the two prophets<n id="3" /> <st data-num="305" class="">went up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3507" class="">cloud</st> while<n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st> <st data-num="2334">stared at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.
Just then a major earthquake took place and a tenth of the city collapsed; seven thousand people were killed in the earthquake, and the rest were terrified and gave glory to the God of heaven.
The second woe has come and gone; the third is coming quickly.

Then the seventh angel blew his trumpet, and there were loud voices in heaven saying:

“The kingdom of the world

has become the kingdom of our Lord

and of his Christ,

and he will reign for ever and ever.”
Then the twenty-four elders who are seated on their thrones before God threw themselves down with their faces to the ground and worshiped God

with these words:

“We give you thanks, Lord God, the All-Powerful,

the one who is and who was,

because you have taken your great power

and begun to reign.

The nations were enraged,

but your wrath has come,

and the time has come for the dead to be judged,

and the time has come to give to your servants,

the prophets, their reward,

as well as to the saints

and to those who revere your name, both small and great,

and the time has come to destroy those who destroy the earth.”

Then the temple of God in heaven was opened, and the ark of his covenant was visible within his temple. And there were flashes of lightning, roaring, crashes of thunder, an earthquake, and a great hailstorm.
